turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: Whaddya think?

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: What do I know?  I'm just a bartender.

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: Let's go, Reggie.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: How'd they take it back at headquarters?

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: Usual bullshit.  You make one smart move and everybody wants to be your friend... You know somethin', shootin' guys sucks. Especially compared to this.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: I've been waiting a long time to hear you say that.

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: Yeah, bein' a hard-ass all the time is a real drag, but it works.

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: Three more hours...

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: Where is he?

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: Promised I'd turn my back while he... ah, never mind...

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: Tell me.

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: He's takin' care of the same business I'll be takin' care of - soon as I dry off.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: You're impossible...

turns.speaker: CATES
turns.text: That's what I always say.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: Who the hell are you?

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Name's Hammond, Reggie Hammond. I heard a lot about you. And any friend of Jack's is a friend of mine.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: I'm not so sure I can say the same thing...You don't look like a cop.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Well, I been workin' the other side of the street for the last few years.  And you don't exactly look like a shrink, wearin' that dress...

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: Shrink major, not a shrink.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Hard man to live with.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: How would you know?

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Hey, two days with him is enough.

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: That's no bull.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: He was the only one of my bunch that was my friend... He was loyal, went all the way for you...

turns.speaker: ELAINE
turns.text: In all due respect, he sounds kind of pathetic to me.  The kind of guy that runs home to his momma or some girlfriend.  Have you two ace detectives checked that out?

turns.speaker: LISA
turns.text: Hey...

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Shut up.

turns.speaker: LISA
turns.text: What the hell's wrong?  I didn't do anything.

turns.speaker: LISA
turns.text: What do you want?  What's goin' on?

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Shut up.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Stall.

turns.speaker: LISA
turns.text: What do you want?

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Keep stallin'.

turns.speaker: LISA
turns.text: Alright, I'm coming...hold on.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: How hot are they?

turns.speaker: HENRY
turns.text: Hot?  Hey, they're not even room temperature.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: How ya doin'?

turns.speaker: HENRY
turns.text: Can't complain.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: We got a lot to talk about.

turns.speaker: HENRY
turns.text: Yeah, old times.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: We'll follow you.  Take it slow,okay?

turns.speaker: HENRY
turns.text: Sure, right.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Surprise, Luther.

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: Whaddya want?  I thought you were locked up-

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: I want the money, asshole, what do you think?  The money that Reggie hid...

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: I don't know what you're talkin' about.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: You want that Indian to snap her neck?

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Instead of worryin' about Reggie, you better worry about me...

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: Don't give me this, we were partners.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: Billy, go ahead, break it...

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: No! Don't kill her.  I can get you the money.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: When?

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: I can't get it until Monday. Honest.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: You chickenshit punk...

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: Honest. The place we stashed it opens Monday morning. I can't get it till then. Monday morning, that's when it opens. After that, I'll get the money to you right away...

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: Come on, you can trust me. Please.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: You try to mess with us or go to the cops, I promise you, I'll put holes in her you wouldn't believe.

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: Let her go.

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: First, the money.

turns.speaker: LUTHER
turns.text: Rosalie, you okay?

turns.speaker: GANZ
turns.text: What are you talkin' about? I said I wouldn't hurt her.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: How you doing, man?

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: Not bad, not bad.

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: You want to go outside?

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Naw, right here's okay.

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: You sure?

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: I'm sure.  Everybody here's looking at everybody else's ass.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: How about some ammo?

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: It's loaded... I got some shells in here.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: How much?

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: This is clean shit.  No serial numbers and never been used...

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Don't mess with me. How much?

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: Five bills.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Five.  On credit.

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: This ain't a credit business.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Yeah, I know that, but this is me and we're old friends. I haven't got the money so what are you gonna do about it?

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: Give it back.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: Try and take it.

turns.speaker: SOSNA
turns.text: Fuck you.  You got no right for this kind of play.

turns.speaker: HAMMOND
turns.text: I'll got your money to you. No sweat.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Appipulai Leeloo Minai..

turns.speaker: LEELOO
turns.text: Corn-i-Lius?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: At your service.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: What're you laughing about?

turns.speaker: LEELOO
turns.text: Napoleon... small.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: The case..with the stones... Where is it?

turns.speaker: LEELOO
turns.text: San Agamat chay bet... envolet!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: The case was stolen?

turns.speaker: LEELOO
turns.text: Ikset-kiba.  Me imanetaba oum dalat!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: You know exactly where they are!

turns.speaker: LEELOO
turns.text: Vano da, mechteba?! Soun domo kala chon hammas!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: No, I'm not proud of myself... But we don't have the luxury of choice.

turns.speaker: LEELOO
turns.text: Akta dedero ansila do mektet.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: I can't pretend to be your husband... David's in great shape.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: ...We're saved!

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: I'm fucked!

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Zorg. Jean-Baptiste Emmanuel Zorg... nice to see you again

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: I remember you now..the so called art dealer.

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: I'm glad you got your memory back, Father... Because you're going to need it... Where are the stones?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: ...Why on earth do the stones interest you?

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Personally, they are of no interest to me, I'd rather sell weapons..but I have a customer... so tell me...

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Even it I did know where the stones were I would never tell somebody like you.

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Why?  What's wrong with me?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: ...I'm a priest! I'm here to serve life, All you want to do is destroy it.

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Ah, Father... You are so wrong. Let me explain...

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: ...would you like a drink?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: No thank you.

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Follow me.. Life, which you so nobly serve, comes from destruction. Look at this empty glass.

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: ...Look at all these little things... so busy all of a sudden. Notice how each one is useful. What a lovely ballet, so full of form and color.  So full of..life!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: They are robots!

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Father, by creating a little destruction, I am, in fact, encouraging life!  So, in reality, you and I are in the same business!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Destroying a glass is one thing..killing people with the weapons you produce is quite another.

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: Let me reassure you Father..I will never kill more people in my entire life than religion has killed in the last 2000 years.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: You are a monster, Zorg!

turns.speaker: ZORG
turns.text: I know...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Excuse me, I'm looking for a priest.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Weddings are one floor down. Congratulations.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: She's not my bride, she's my fare. She's looking for this Vito Cornelius. According to the phone guide he lives here.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: That's me.  But I don't know who she is... where did you find her?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: She dropped in on me... holding this.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Who are you?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I brought the girl remember?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: The girl?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: He's a she!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: You noticed...

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: There's not a moment to lose! Wake her up, but be gentle about it!  This woman is mankind's most precious possession! She is... perfect!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: So you do know her.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Uh yes, we're cousins..distant cousins..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: They all like this in your family, father?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: She's an exception..

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help Mr...?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Dallas. Korben Dallas.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Yes. That's fine! Thank you very much. A thousand times over!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I might call to check up on her, you know... to see if she's better?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: She's fine, really..don't you worry.. just needs some rest..she's had a very long trip.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I know. I was there when she arrived.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Excuse me! Just one thing!  She said something to me a while ago and... I don't really get it... Akta Gamat?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: It means, "Never without my permission".

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: That's what I thought.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: I'm sorry to have to resort to such methods, but we heard about your good luck on he radio and we need the tickets to Fhloston.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Is that the usual way priests go on vacation?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: We're not going on vacation..we're on a mission..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: What kind of mission?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: We have to save the world.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Good luck..

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Father, I was in the Army for awhile and every time they told us we were on a mission to save the world the only thing that changed was I lost a lot of friends. So thanks for the offer.. but no thanks.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Trying to save your ass so you can save the world.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: You're probably very angry with me and I quite understand. But I want you to know I'm fighting for a noble cause.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Yeah, I know... to save the world... but right now all I want to do is save Leeloo.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Leeloo's in trouble?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: When is she not in trouble?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Uh.. Have you tried the Diva's suite?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Don't tell me you don't know how all this works?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Theoretically, yes! The four Stones form the beam and the Fifth Element is supposed to stand in the middle there, but... I don't have the reference book. I've never seen the Stones work!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: There's no light! You told me there were supposed to be four beams of light.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Yes, of course, but... The Stones are shut! They have to be open for it to work.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: And you don't know how they open, is that what you are saying?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: That's what I'm saying.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Imagine for a moment that this. thing is not anything that can be identified because it prefers not to be, because it is the antithesis of all we are. Because it is evil.. TOTAL EVIL.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: One more reason to shoot first eh?

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Your theory is interesting Father but I don't think we have time to go into it right now!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Time is of no importance, Mr. President. Only life is important.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: That's exactly what we are going to try and do: Protect the lives of some 200 billion of our fellow citizens! General? You may fire when ready.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: We have forty-eight hours, the time it needs to adapt itself to our living conditions.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: And then?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: And then it will be too late. The goal of evil is to wipe out life! All forms of life. For all eternity...Life upsets it.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Is there anything that can stop it?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Yes..thank God..

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: But what happens if instead of this... Ultimate Warrior... it is EVIL who stands here?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: White turns to black.  Light to Dark. Life to Death.  For all eternity.

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: Did you see that..thing..swallow our battleship like a gum drop?  You can't even tell me what it is! I ask you for options you give me bullshit. Give them permission to enter our territories with my warmest regards.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Thank you, Mr. President.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: What are we going to do?

turns.speaker: PRESIDENT
turns.text: This is government business now. You ought to go home and get some rest, Father.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: It's a miracle!!!

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: What is?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: I can't wear these clothes! This calls for dignity! I have to dress the part!

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: Father, will you please explain what's going on?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: The Supreme Being, the fifth element is here, in our parish!!! It's a miracle!!!

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: Father.  You sure she's the Supreme Being?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Absolutely sure There's the triple suns on her gloves!

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: What's she doing?

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Learning our history! The last 5000 years that she missed! She's been out of circulation a while, you know.

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: Uh father, I know she's been through a lot... but the sacred stones..we don't have much time..

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Yes. Of course..

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: There was this guy with a limp who came a month ago..said he was an art dealer ... Asking all these questions about the Sacred Stones..at the time I didn't think anything of it.. What was his name? I'm so bad with names...

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: I didn't know your size.

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: They really made her...

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: I got it!  Everything  here we need to know about Fhloston Paradise Hotel... and a detailed blueprint of the entire hotel!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Good work, my son.  Now all we need is a way to get there.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Where's Leeloo?

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: On the plane... with Mr. Dallas... the real one.

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: It's all my fault.  I'm the servant... It's my mission! Here!

turns.speaker: DAVID
turns.text: You're all safe. Thanks be to God!

turns.speaker: CORNELIUS
turns.text: Later, David! Later! There's not a minute to lose!

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: You're a good man... She was right to have chosen you...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Who?

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: The Fifth Element... The Supreme Being... Your wife...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Leeloo... is... she's...

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: Yes, and more than that... You must give her the Stones, she's the only one who knows how to use them.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: ...So Cornelius was telling the truth!

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: She was taught to love the life of others... but not her own. You have to teach her to love if you want her to truly live!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I'll help her, I promise, but I think you should tell me where the Stones are!

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: Do you love her?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I... I don't know! We hardly know each other... it takes time!

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: I don't have time... I need to know.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Listen, the last time I admitted to a woman I loved her ... I never saw her again.

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: I would like to have died in peace...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I'm sorry, but... the Stones...

turns.speaker: DIVA
turns.text: They are... with me...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Yeah?

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: Hey bud! Finger here.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: I love you too Major, but you haven't called me that since basic training.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I was talking to the cat.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: Oh, yeah, I forgot.You still prefer your cat to the real thing.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: At least, the cat comes back.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: You still pining for that two timing bitch. Forget her. There are a million women out there.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I don't want a million - I just want one.  A perfect one.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: Don't exist bud.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I just found a picture of you.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: How do I look?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Like shit.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I don't need one.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: You forgetting who sat next to you for a thousand missions. I know how you drive.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Finger!  I'm driving a cab now, not a space fighter!!

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: How many points you got left on your license?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Uh... at least fifty.

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: In your dreams! See you tonight!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: Hey bud...I'm waiting all day here.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Finger..man..I'm sorry..listen..I was on the way over but I had a fare fall into my lap.. y'know one of those big fares you just can't resist..

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: So, just how big was this fare?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: 5'7", green eyes... long legs... great skin... perfect..

turns.speaker: FINGER
turns.text: Uh huh..and I don't suppose you got the name of this..perfect fare..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Leeloo..

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Akina delutan, nou-shan.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: ...'Scuse me?

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Daya deo dono Dato.  Dalutan!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: It there's one thing I don't need advice on, it's how to drive.

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: ...Priest...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: You're not that bad... Come on we'll get you to a doctor.

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Vito... Cor... Ni-lious... Priest...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Vito Cornelius?

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Eto Akta Gamat!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I'm sorry, it's just that... I was told to wake you up gently, so I figured...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: ...What's your name?

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: Leeloo Minai Lekarariba-Laminai-Tchai Ekbat De Sebat.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Hey,  that's... cute... Do you have a nickname, something a little... shorter?

turns.speaker: GIRL
turns.text: ...Leeloo.

turns.speaker: PRIEST
turns.text: The Fifth Element...

turns.speaker: KOMMANDER
turns.text: Take them and put them in a safe place.

turns.speaker: PRIEST
turns.text: Will the elements be gone now forever from this place?

turns.speaker: KOMMANDER
turns.text: When mankind comes to its senses. We will return.

turns.speaker: PRIEST
turns.text: Knowing mankind as I do, that could take centuries!

turns.speaker: KOMMANDER
turns.text: Time is of no importance, only life is important.

turns.speaker: KOMMANDER
turns.text: When EVIL returns so shall we.

turns.speaker: PRIEST
turns.text: We will be ready, Lord.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: ...Hello?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: You're the nastiest dirtbag I know in this stinking City!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Hi Ma...

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: I've been playing twice a week for 20 years, 20 years I've been eating those shitty croquettes.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Are you listening to me, you ingrate!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Yes ma..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Other than that... You all right?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: ...And now you're making fun of me? I'm warning you! If you don't take me after all these years of sacrifice, I'll never forgive you!!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I'm coming!. Ma, what're you talking about?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: I get it! You want to make me beg, is that it?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: All I want is an explanation! I just got in, I lost my job. I smashed my cab. I got mugged, but other than that everything's peachy, Ma, thanks for asking!! Now settle down and explain to me calmly..

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: You just won a trip, you dolt! Ten days in Fhloston Paradise for two!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Ma. If I'd won, I'd know about it. Someone would have notified me.

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: They've been blaring out your name on the radio for the last hour, blockhead!

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Yeah?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Have you pulled yourself together?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: ...Not yet.

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Hello?

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: You little sleaze bag!

turns.speaker: MOTHER
turns.text: Don't you ever ask me for another thing in my life again, you've killed your poor mother with your own hands!

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: Welcome on board Mr. Dallas..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: How you doing this morning?  Sleep OK? I didn't.

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: Fuel level 6.03..Propulsion 2x4...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I had the worst goddamn nightmare.

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: You have nine points left on your license..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Thanks for reminding me..

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: I'm sorry..

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: This is a police control action..

turns.speaker: VOICE
turns.text: 30 seconds...

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Anyone know how to release the lines on this crate?

turns.speaker: KORBEN
turns.text: Found it?

turns.speaker: LOC RHOD
turns.text: Does it get any better or what!
